3: After checking multiple times, you push open the door before you.
Just like the numerous doors you have already opened, the scene behind this door makes no sense at all from an architectural perspective.
When I'm back to reality, I will probably be disappointed if I don't see a ruin after opening a door.
Indeed. We have seen too many abnormal things behind those doors. I won't blame you if you are disappointed after seeing normal scenes.
Is that M.I.N.D. deviation...? I'll book a calibration for us after we go back.
Let's end this. My sensor is going to get faulty if I stay in this environment for too long.
Yeah, the movie is ending soon. This is the last battle.
Destroy the only Book of Death, and the memory spaces will lose their foundation.
With this final determination, you step into the strange door—
